segments.text: Hey , guys ! Did you see that sign ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a garage sale around the corner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A garage sale ... that's where people check out cars , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm pulling your leg , Paul . I'm a shopping queen , remember ? So of course I know what a garage sale is all about !
segments.speaker: S2
